Text.First UserStory: user_story_24: #g27# as a #faculty member#, i want to #upload# my #scholarly work# to the #repository#, so that i can have a persistent url that can be used for my personal web page and cv.

Second UserStory: so that i can #deliver# such #content# in the manner best fit to the audience or occasion.
